data.name: AdvancedDisplaySettings
data.comment: Area System, only available on devices that support advanced display options

data.name: AdvertisingId
data.comment: Area Privacy, Deprecated in Windows 10, version 1809 and later

data.name: AltAndTab
data.comment: Means the key combination "Tabulator+Alt" on the keyboard

data.name: AppSettingsApp
data.comment: Type of the setting is a "Modern Windows settings". We use the same term as used in start menu search at the moment.

data.name: AppVolumeAndDevicePreferences
data.comment: Area System, Added in Windows 10, version 1903

data.name: Area
data.comment: Mean the settings area or settings category

data.name: AudioAndSpeech
data.comment: Area MixedReality, only available if the Mixed Reality Portal app is installed.

data.name: BatterySaver
data.comment: Area System, only available on devices that have a battery, such as a tablet

data.name: BatterySaverSettings
data.comment: Area System, only available on devices that have a battery, such as a tablet

data.name: BatteryUse
data.comment: Area System, only available on devices that have a battery, such as a tablet

data.name: ChooseWhichFoldersAppearOnStart
data.value: Başlangıç ekranında hangi klasörlerin görüneceğini seçin

data.name: Command
data.comment: The command to direct start a setting

data.name: ControlPanel
data.comment: Type of the setting is a "(legacy) Control Panel setting"

data.name: CoreIsolation
data.comment: Means the protection of the system core

data.name: deuteranopia
data.comment: Medical: Mean you don't can see red colors

data.name: DirectAccess
data.comment: Area NetworkAndInternet, only available if DirectAccess is enabled

data.name: Environment
data.comment: Area MixedReality, only available if the Mixed Reality Portal app is installed.

data.name: Extras
data.comment: Area Extra, , only used for setting of 3rd-Party tools

data.name: Glance
data.comment: Area Personalization, Deprecated in Windows 10, version 1809 and later

data.name: GreenWeek
data.comment: Mean you don't can see green colors

data.name: HeadsetDisplay
data.comment: Area MixedReality, only available if the Mixed Reality Portal app is installed.

data.name: JapanImeSettings
data.comment: Area TimeAndLanguage, available if the Microsoft Japan input method editor is installed

data.name: MailMicrosoftExchangeOrWindowsMessaging
data.value: Posta - Microsoft Exchange veya Windows Mesajlaşma

data.name: MouseFontsKeyboardAndPrintersProperties
data.value: Fare, Yazı tipleri, Klavye ve Yazıcı özellikleri

data.name: NoteAddYourPhone
data.value: Yalnızca cihazınıza bir mobil cihaz bağlı olduğunda kullanılabilir.

data.name: NoteAdvancedGraphics
data.value: Yalnızca gelişmiş grafik seçeneklerini destekleyen cihazlarda kullanılabilir.

data.name: NoteBattery
data.value: Yalnızca pil bulunan (örneğin tablet) cihazlarda kullanılabilir.

data.name: NoteDeprecated17763
data.value: Windows 10, sürüm 1809 (derleme 17763) ve sonraki sürümlerde kullanım dışı bırakıldı.

data.name: NoteDisplayGraphics
data.value: Yalnızca gelişmiş görüntüleme seçeneklerini destekleyen cihazlarda kullanılabilir.

data.name: NoteEnrolledWIP
data.value: Yalnızca kullanıcı WIP'ye kayıtlı ise mevcuttur.

data.name: NoteImeJapan
data.value: Microsoft Japonya giriş yöntemi düzenleyicisi yüklüyse kullanılabilir.

data.name: NoteImePinyin
data.value: Microsoft Pinyin giriş yöntemi düzenleyicisi yüklüyse kullanılabilir.

data.name: NoteImeWubi
data.value: Microsoft Wubi giriş yöntemi düzenleyicisi yüklüyse kullanılabilir.

data.name: NoteMixedReality
data.value: Yalnızca Karma Gerçeklik Portal uygulaması yüklüyse kullanılabilir.

data.name: NoteMobileProvisioning
data.value: Yalnızca mobil cihazlarda ve kuruluş bir sağlama paketi dağıttıysa kullanılabilir.

data.name: NoteThirdParty
data.value: Yalnızca "ayarlar uygulamaları" yüklüyse kullanılabilir. (örneğin 3. bir taraf tarafından)

data.name: NoteTouchpad
data.value: Yalnızca dokunmatik yüzey donanımı varsa kullanılabilir.

data.name: NoteWiFiAdapter
data.value: Yalnızca cihazda bir Wi-Fi bağdaştırıcısı varsa kullanılabilir.

data.name: NoteWindowsAnywhere
data.value: Cihazın Windows Anywhere özelliğine sahip olması gerekir.

data.name: NoteWorkplaceProvisioning
data.value: Yalnızca kuruluş bir sağlama paketi dağıttıysa kullanılabilir.

data.name: PinyinImeSettings
data.comment: Area TimeAndLanguage, available if the Microsoft Pinyin input method editor is installed

data.value: Pinyin IME ayarları - etki alanı sözlüğü

data.name: protanopia
data.comment: Medical: Mean you don't can see green colors

data.name: Provisioning
data.comment: Area UserAccounts, only available if enterprise has deployed a provisioning package

data.name: Ram
data.comment: Means the Read-Access-Memory (typical the used to inform about the size)

data.name: RedEye
data.comment: Mean red eye effect by over-the-night flights

data.name: RedGreen
data.comment: Mean the weakness you can't differ between red and green colors

data.name: RedWeek
data.comment: Mean you don't can see red colors

data.name: SettingsHomePage
data.comment: Area Home, Overview-page for all areas of settings

data.name: ShortNameWiFi
data.comment: dont translate this, is a short term to find entries

data.name: Tab
data.comment: Means the key "Tabulator" on the keyboard

data.name: tritanopia
data.comment: Medical: Mean you don't can see yellow and blue colors

data.name: Uninstall
data.comment: Area MixedReality, only available if the Mixed Reality Portal app is installed.

data.name: Virus
data.comment: Means the virus in computers and software

data.name: WiFi
data.comment: Area NetworkAndInternet, only available if Wi-Fi calling is enabled

data.name: WindowsAnywhere
data.comment: Area UserAccounts, device must be Windows Anywhere-capable
